about_the_game:
It's pirates against British sailors (or each other) in this real-time strategy city-building game. Gather resources, build cities, drink rum, fight enemies, explore the sea, and discover new islands.


RECRUIT PIRATE LEGENDS & BUILD YOUR OWN PIRATE EMPIRE!




HARVEST THE FOREST'S BOUNTY, GATHER SUGAR CANE & CARVE THE BEDROCK OF YOUR EMPIRE!

Supply your empire with the essential wood for construction and conquest. Set the stage for rum, sugar, and molasses, enriching your reserves and trade options. Extract stone and iron to construct unassailable fortresses and weapons that forge legends.




FORGE ELITE UNITS!

Equip your ranks with Swordsmen, Gunmen, and Captains to dominate land and sea. Conquer the monsters inhabiting the islands, expand your empire, and defend it from the British sailors!




BUILD MIGHTY SHIPS & DISCOVER THE RICHES OF UNDISCOVERED ISLANDS!

Launch formidable fleets to rule the waves and transport your ambitions across oceans.
